channel.title: Starting to model again
channel.description:
Yeah, so I found out that my friend drew swords a lot, so I decided to take one of them and make it into a model. Its still in progress, but meh, I'll finish it within a week or two, whenever I have free time.
Model so far: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/8Fd8R.jpg[/img]
Original Drawing: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/3Yahb.jpg[/img]
Wireframe (DAMN she ugly!) [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/aBVYq.png[/img]
And all I can say is that holes are fucking annoying to make in Meta. After the second one I was kinda just "fuck it" and went on to make the basic blade shape. I may toy around with making it serrated, but my next step in making the model is the handle/hilt. It shouldn't be as bad hole-wise as the handle is.

item.title: Starting to model again
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

I believe what you would do in meta for a transparency map would just use a texture that has alpha for the holes. And that is how you are supposed to do holes. Without using n-gons. To get a nice sharp subdivision on those holes I would extrude the faces inside of the hole and it should be fine.

Read full topic

item.title: Starting to model again
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

Updated the main post with the wire frame. I personally hate the way I made the holes though - I used the knife tool and it ended up making the wireframe around those segments of the handle rather ugly

@Dylan: What’s a transparency map? I’m still out of the loop If you mean modeling with only the wire frame and hiding the faces, then I guess that’s what I did.

@Wanderer: I will at some point, I just need to see if I can neaten up the segments where the holes are in Meta.

Read full topic

item.title: Starting to model again
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

subdivide those holes so they look more circular. Actually like the concept a lot.

Read full topic

item.title: Starting to model again
item.dc:creator: @dylan_0789 dylan_0789
item.description:
@dylan_0789 wrote:

Wire frame, please? Not much I can say otherwise, but lets see… The holes aren’t circular(mainly the lower one), which I am assuming they are supposed to be (also, you could have used a transparency map to make them). The hilt will be pretty easy for you to make, especially because I know you can model

Read full topic
